msg: LUCENE-3097: Added a new grouping collector that can be used to retrieve all most relevant documents per group.

author: chirino
msg: Build breaks on OS X Lion, Switching to Scalate 1.6.0-SNAPSHOT fixes the problem.

author: sf
msg: Change the default for mod_proxy from 'reallyall' to 'most'.
Most mod_proxy_* modules default to whatever mod_proxy is set to.
Do this for mod_proxy_express, too (was explicit 'most').
